title: The Railrodder
creator_credit: Julian Biggs, ONF | NFB and Gerald Potterton
brief_description: A humorous trip across Canada from the Atlantic to the Pacific with Buster Keaton riding on a rail “trike” which contains everything he needs in the way of food, clothing, tools, bedding, shaving gear, and even a rifle. This is Buster Keaton’s last film, made by the National Film Board before he died. It is a travelogue with a difference.
